articles.author: Trevor Hughes
articles.title: Tired of your state politics? These residents are looking to secession as the solution.
articles.description: An Oregon ballot initiative is the latest in a long line of secession efforts that speak to the nation's sharp divide.
articles.content:
PRINEVILLE, Oregon Tens of thousands of rural, conservative eastern Oregon residents are so frustrated with their liberal urban neighbors they've decided they can no longer even share a ZIP code.
